name: Notice.AAA6.DefResponse.MoreTimeRequested.Claimant
descriptionEn: The response deadline for the defendant is now ${defaultRespondTime} on ${respondent1ResponseDeadlineEn}. There are {daysLeftToRespond} days remaining.
descriptionCy: Y terfyn amser ar gyfer ymateb y diffynnydd nawr yw ${defaultRespondTime} ar ${respondent1ResponseDeadlineCy}. Mae yna {daysLeftToRespond} diwrnod yn weddill.
